gov.nasa.larcfm.Util

Class SimpleMovingPoly

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.nasa.larcfm.Util.SimpleMovingPoly

  • public class SimpleMovingPoly
extends java.lang.Object
    A "stateful" version of a SimplePoly that includes velocity.

      • toStringList

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> toStringList(int vertex,
                                                     boolean trkgsvs,
                                                     int precision)
        Create a list of strings describing one vertex: lat, lon, alt, alt2, trk, gs, vs (or sx, sy, sz)
        Parameters:
        vertex - vertex number
        trkgsvs - true use track/Gs/Vs, false use Euclidean velocity vector (sx, sy, sz)
        precision - number of fractional digits in fields
        Returns:
